intro: Save the world in this steampunk roguelite full of mystery.
description:
Welcome to Luminaria Dark Echoes, a narrative roguelite-survivor game where you'll uncover the mysteries of a post-apocalyptic steampunk world.

Experience a fascinating story, fight off hordes of enemies, and face epic final bosses in a challenging and replayable experience.

Embark on an exciting odyssey to battle growing darkness and confront terrifying bosses. Armed with light-powered weapons, uncover dark secrets and overcome epic challenges in a steampunk world full of mystery.

Are you ready to embark on a journey filled with light and adventure?

In an alternate universe where the Industrial Revolution took a dark turn and light became a rare treasure, a world war left humanity on the brink of extinction. Amid the ruins, a few brave survivors endure. Now, a dark entity rises, corrupting souls and plunging the world into deep darkness.

Will you dare to challenge the darkness in this alternate world?

In the vast world of Luminaria, choose your path and define your destiny. Each phase is a unique chapter where light guides your steps through ever-changing steampunk darkness.

Let the light be your guide.

Evolve with powerful new abilities as you progress. Learn spells, increase your strength, stamina, and speed to become a master of light.

Develop your luminous skills!

Key Features

Narrative roguelite-survivor adventure.  
Explore a vast interconnected world, filled with shadows and excitement at every corner.  
Luminous Equipment Customization.  
Upgrade your abilities with every choice at the shop.  
Find light-powered weapons, from glowing staffs to solar flamethrowers.   
Face a wide variety of twisted enemies and ancient corrupted automatons.  
Challenge epic bosses, each with unique tactics and powerful dark abilities that will test your courage.
